_meta.source: Derived from highlight and shadow alpha values in Figma
_meta.description: Airtime design system opacity tokens. Derived from alpha values used in highlight, shadow, and modeless color tokens.
_meta.rationale: Values extracted from existing color token alphas: highlight/primary dark=8%, highlight/secondary dark=16%, modeless/white-24=24%, modeless/overlay=50%. Additional levels for disabled states and full transparency.
